actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide Federal grants to assist elementary and secondary schools to carry on programs to teach the principles of citizenship and ethics.

summary.text: Authorizes the Commissioner of Education to make grants to State educational agencies to assist them in establishing and carrying out programs for instructing public elementary and secondary school students in citizenship and ethics. Stipulates that the nature of such instruction shall conform to general standards prescribed by the State agency supervising the program.

titles.title: A bill to provide Federal grants to assist elementary and secondary schools to carry on programs to teach the principles of citizenship and ethics.
